backend/main.mo: Manages per-caller app settings with access control, allowing users to read or update their own settings and admins to view others' settings.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking Namaz Öğretici refactor requirements to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of many frontend files, describing their purpose and functionality within the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering header and tabbed navigation for all app sections.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Responsive tab navigation component providing five primary app tabs with icons.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Card UI prompting the user to choose a location with a button callback.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Renders a styled card for an Esmaül Hüsna item with rotating color themes and tap interaction.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Defines the EsmaulHusnaItem interface and exports an array of Allah’s names with Arabic text, transliteration, Turkish meaning, and related prayers.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Displays a grid of Esmaül Hüsna cards and shows item details in a dialog when selected.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Calculates the current prayer slot by comparing the current time to adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Main home tab component that shows location selection, weather summary, next prayer countdown, and prayer time cards depending on user settings.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays the upcoming prayer and remaining time using computed countdown data, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Renders four clickable content cards (verse, hadith, dua, esma) for the current prayer slot with a dialog for detailed text.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Exports a list of dua items containing Arabic text, Turkish translation, and usage occasions.
Exports a list of hadith items with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and source references.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports an array of Quran verses with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that determines and updates the current prayer time slot by recalculating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: React hook that finds the next prayer time and computes the remaining time until it, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching, selecting, and saving a geographic location using geocoding results.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Handles location search via Open-Meteo API and converts geocoding results into internal Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines Location and GeocodingResult types used for geocoding and location handling.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that fetches geocoding results based on user search text.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Renders the prayer tutorial section with rakat info and gender-specific step-by-step prayer instructions.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Provides rakat counts and detailed step sequences for men’s and women’s prayer tutorials.
Fetches daily prayer times from the Aladhan API and maps them into a simplified structure.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays prayer times for the selected location with optional minute offsets and allows editing the offset setting.
Provides functions to apply minute offsets to individual times and complete prayer time sets.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that loads prayer times for the given location with caching and retries.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Defines the shape of application settings including location, offsets, notifications, and zikirmatik data.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Handles loading, migrating, and saving app settings in localStorage with versioning and defaults.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Renders settings UI for prayer time offsets and notification lead times, allowing users to save changes.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: React Query–based hook for loading and updating app settings persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather data from Open-Meteo and provides a helper to map weather codes to descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React Query hook to fetch and cache weather data for the selected location.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Displays current weather for the selected location using fetched data and fallback prompts when missing.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital tally counter with persistence, target setting, progress display, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity, initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, status flags, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables, and light/dark theme colors with additional utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app requirements, architecture notes, existing features, and future functional specifications.
